mapper.select: SELECT r.reservation_no reservationNo, r.emp_no empNo, r.utility_no utilityNo, r.reservation_date reservationDate, r.reservation_time reservationTime, r.createdate createdate, e.emp_name empName, u.utility_category utilityCategory FROM reservation r JOIN emp_info e ON r.emp_no = e.emp_no JOIN utility u ON r.utility_no = u.utility_no WHERE DATE(r.reservation_date) = #{date}
